From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Hey Soulstice, how ya doin? I havent heard much from you lately, you
okay? Also don't worry, i believe you didnt write those things (damn
frustrating though). Anyways the council is trying to decide a character
limit, because in the past, people have constantly brought in new
characters, carrying to many, and then forgetting about the older ones.
We want to know what in your opinion would be a good number limit.

Somebody suggested 15, and no limit to the number in a faction. What is
your thought?

We also think that to be a faction, someone needs to have a least three
different people in the group. What do you think about this?
